oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An explanation of No. 2 of Mr G.W. Stow s collection of copies of Bushman Paintings was given, in the Katkop dialect by D !kw in (L V.
5742). The painting features figures (numbered) and animals. D !kw in describes some of the hunting methods of the |xam.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Explanation of Mr G. Stow's pictures: no. 2
